articles.title: THN Recap: Top Cybersecurity Threats, Tools, and Practices (Nov 04 - Nov 10)

articles.description:
In an unusually specific campaign, users searching about the legality of Bengal Cats in Australia are being targeted with the GootLoader malware.

articles.title: New GootLoader Campaign Targets Users Searching for Bengal Cat Laws in Australia

articles.author: info@thehackernews.com (The Hacker News)
articles.description:
Cyber threats are intensifying, and cybersecurity has become critical to business operations. As security budgets grow, CEOs and boardrooms are demanding concrete evidence that cybersecurity initiatives deliver value beyond regulation compliance.
Just like you wouldn’t buy a car without knowing it was first put through a crash test, security systems must also be validated to confirm their value.
articles.title: The ROI of Security Investments: How Cybersecurity Leaders Prove It

articles.title: Security Flaws in Popular ML Toolkits Enable Server Hijacks, Privilege Escalation

AOS-10.4.x.x: 10.4.1.4 and below

articles.title: Cybercriminals Use Excel Exploit to Spread Fileless Remcos RAT Malware

articles.title: AndroxGh0st Malware Integrates Mozi Botnet to Target IoT and Cloud Services

articles.title: IcePeony and Transparent Tribe Target Indian Entities with Cloud-Based Tools
